fallback.answer: I do not have that information yet. Please contact the relevant council office or check the official website.
fallback.answer_sw: Sina taarifa hiyo kwa sasa. Tafadhali wasiliana na ofisi husika ya halmashauri au tembelea tovuti rasmi.

intents.question: How do I access TAMISEMI e-Services?
intents.answer: Open the e-Services directory, choose the service you need, and follow the official portal link provided.
intents.question_sw: Nawezaje kufikia huduma za TAMISEMI mtandaoni?
intents.answer_sw: Fungua orodha ya huduma mtandaoni, chagua huduma unayohitaji, kisha fuata kiungo cha tovuti rasmi.

intents.question: Where can I read government news updates?
intents.answer: Go to the News tab to see the latest updates from TAMISEMI and local authorities.
intents.question_sw: Ninaweza kusoma wapi taarifa za serikali?
intents.answer_sw: Nenda kwenye sehemu ya Habari kuona taarifa mpya kutoka TAMISEMI na mamlaka za serikali za mitaa.

intents.question: How can I find my council or district website?
intents.answer: Open the Tovuti page, search your region, then open the council or district details to access the official website.
intents.question_sw: Ninawezaje kupata tovuti ya halmashauri au wilaya?
intents.answer_sw: Fungua ukurasa wa Tovuti, tafuta mkoa wako, kisha fungua taarifa za halmashauri au wilaya ili kupata tovuti rasmi.

intents.question: Who should use these services?
intents.answer: Citizens, government officers, and partners can use the services to access official information and digital government services.
intents.question_sw: Ni nani anapaswa kutumia huduma hizi?
intents.answer_sw: Wananchi, watumishi wa serikali, na washirika wanaweza kutumia huduma hizi kupata taarifa rasmi na huduma za serikali mtandaoni.

intents.question: How do I contact a council or district?
intents.answer: Open the council or district details page to find the official website, email, and contact information.
intents.question_sw: Ninawezaje kuwasiliana na halmashauri au wilaya?
intents.answer_sw: Fungua ukurasa wa maelezo ya halmashauri au wilaya ili kupata tovuti rasmi, barua pepe, na taarifa za mawasiliano.
